question: Which country houses the ancient settlement area "La Ciudad Blanca"?
explanation: La Ciudad Blanca is a legendary settlement said to be located in the Mosquitia region of eastern Honduras. This extensive area of rainforest, which includes the Rio Platano Biosphere Reserve, has long been the subject of multidisciplinary research. Archaeologists refer to it as being a part of the Isthmo-Colombian Area of the Americas, one in which the predominant indigenous languages included those in the Chibchan and Misumalpan families.
